Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the central class of the "World of Home" application. "World of Home" is a very simple, text based travel game. Users can walk around some house. That's all. It should really be extended to make it more interesting!
    Version:
    19/2/2019
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling, David J. Barnes and Olaf Chitil

        public boolean finished()
        Return whether the game has finished or not.
        Returns:
        returns finished as either true or false.

      • getCurrent

        public Room getCurrent()
        Return the current room. Post-condition: not null.
        Returns:
        the current roomm the player is in.

      • goRoom

        public java.lang.String goRoom(Direction direction)
        Try to go in one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new room and return its long description; otherwise return an error message.
        Parameters:
        direction - The direction in which to go. Pre-condition: direction is not null. If the player makes it to the end room then the game will quit.

      • help

        public java.lang.String help()
        Give some help information.

      • look

        public java.lang.String look()
        Execute look command.
        Returns:
        the current room's long description.

        Execute quit command.

      • take

        public java.lang.String take(Item item)
        Execute take command.
        Parameters:
        item - The item to take. Pre-condition: item is not null.

      • welcome

        public java.lang.String welcome()
        Opening message for the player.
        Returns:
        a welcome message.
